features.title: Add to Cart
features.description: Enable users to add products to their shopping cart from product pages. Products can be added with quantity selection.
acceptanceCriteria: User can click 'Add to Cart' button on product page
Selected product appears in cart with correct quantity
Cart icon updates to show number of items

features.title: Cart Management
features.description: Allow users to modify cart contents before checkout. Users can adjust product quantities or remove items.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can change product quantity in cart
Users can remove individual items from cart
Cart subtotal updates dynamically with changes

features.title: Checkout Process
features.description: Provide a streamlined checkout workflow for completing purchases. Support guest and registered user checkout.
acceptanceCriteria: Users can proceed to checkout from cart page
Generate order confirmation after successful purchase
